attrs.Abstract: Presentation and recommendations made to an international experts meeting: “Sustainable Developmentin the Arctic in the Face of Global Climate Change: Scientific, Social, Cultural and EducationalChallenges,” Monte Carlo, Monaco, 3–6 March 2009.The statements and positions contained in this report represent the proceedings of the meeting.They are those of the presenter and do not necessarily represent the official position of CDC orthe symposium’s sponsors. International Journal of Circumpolar Health 69:1 2010
attrs.Author: Parkinson, Alan J.
attrs.Short Title: Sustainable development, climate change and human health in the arctic
attrs.Title: Sustainable development, climate change and human health in the Arctic
